name: Samsung 990 Pro 2TB
description: Next-gen PCIe 4.0 NVMe SSD with read speeds up to 7,450 MB/s. Features advanced thermal control, Samsung Magician software, and 5-year warranty. Perfect for gaming and heavy workloads.

reviews.review_text: Blazing fast! Boot times are under 10 seconds now.
The heatsink keeps temps low even under heavy load.
Best SSD I have owned. Samsung quality as always.
